column4: does anybody have any suggestions for me?  I have a TVM monitor, but it won't let me see the login screen.  I can't get the screen above a 800x600 resolution.
have you tried altering the refresh rate on the different resolutions?
yes.  I only have two selections

i've been looking into stuff about monitors today, i dont know what is causing your problem, but it could be a) your video card, not having the correct drivers installed for the OS, b) your monitor is crap, c) erm... see b.
